data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original book / thesis / monograph Piotr Naskrecki (2000): Katydids of Costa Rica / Vol. 1, Systematics and bioacoustics of the cone-head katydids (Orthoptera: Tettigoniidae: Conocephalinae sensu lato). Philadelphia, PA: The Orthopterists Society at the Academy of Natural Sciences of Philadelphia,, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.270035
